Instance.description: A drama node for scheduling something and displaying it on the calendar that has no real functionality other than being there for other systems to test against.

Tunable.name: _simless
Tunable.description: If True, the drama node will behave simlessly and won't need (or use) the receiver sim.

TunableVariant.name: advance_notice_time
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, a calender alarm will be triggered at the specified time prior to the event.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The amount of time between the alert and the start of the event.

TunableVariant.name: calendar_end_time_override
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this will be the time of day shown in the calendar as the end time instead of the time calculated from the start time.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The time of day to display as the end time for this event in the calendar.

TunableVariant.name: calendar_start_time_override
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this will be the time of day shown in the calendar as the start time instead of the scheduled time.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The time this event will display as the start time in the calendar.

TunableList.name: events_of_interest
TunableList.description: When any of these events fire, the sims of interest will be updated, and the event added/removed from the calendar as appropriate

TdescFragTag.name: sim_of_interest_tests
TdescFragTag.description: Tests used to determine which active household sims this event involves. Any sim in the active household that passes the test will be indicated as participating in the calendar. If no household sims Are participating, event won't be on calendar.
